name: NewJerseyBusTracker
0:
”Alexa tell bus tracker my home stop is 20496”
”Alexa ask bus tracker where is the eighty seven bus”
”help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: bus tracker
des:
Welcome to the New Jersey Bus Tracker.

This skill can tell you bus arrival and route information for nearby bus stops for New Jersey buses.
As a first step, let the skill know your bus stop code, It will use this bus stop to give you information about stops and routes closest to this stop.
Bus stop codes are found at https://mybusnow.njtransit.com/bustime/map/displaymap.jsp

For example, if you say "Tell bus tracker my home stop is 20496" It will set your home stop to the Hoboken Bus Terminal, in Hoboken, NJ

Once your home stop is set, you can ask the following questions. (

Ask bus tracker, what are the closest bus stops?
Ask bus tracker, what are the closest bus routes?
Ask bus tracker, where is the 87 bus?

Route 87 is only used as an example. You can use any active bus route.

if you have and comments or suggestions please send an email to info@mystopnow.com

The skill is not sponsored or endorsed by New Jersey Transit
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
